text: Amelia Fiona J. Driver (born 31 January 1970), known professionally as Minnie Driver, is an English actress and singer. Her notable motion pictures include Good Will Hunting. ==Life== Driver was born in Finsbury Park, London. == Other websites == * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:English movie actors Category:English singers Category:English television actors
title: Minnie Driver
